auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

auth.invalidCredentialsMessage: The email or password you entered is incorrect
auth.accountNotFoundMessage: No account found with this email address
auth.passwordMismatchMessage: The passwords you entered do not match
auth.invalidTokenMessage: The token is invalid or has expired
auth.twoFactorAuthMessage: Enter the code sent to your device

license.title: License

license.gracePeriodWarning: Your license is in grace period

license.restrictedModeMessage: Your license has been suspended. You are in restricted mode.
license.backupOnlyModeMessage: Your license has expired beyond grace period. You can only backup your data.
